desc: At CYCLE Kids Bikes, with ultra-lightweight frames and quality components. Our bikes are loved by whole family. Start them off with a 12" Balance Bike and eventually grow them into a 26" Kids Bike! 5% of every bike solid is donated to the CYCLE Kids Organization, helping under-privileged children learn to ride.

layout.text: Apply Cycling Lessons Learned to Every Day Life.
It's important to know how to care for your new bicycle, so we have created a special 'Life Manual' that goes beyond regular maintenance.
